verses.verse: (For the choir director. A Psalm of the sons of Korah.) Hear <S%H8085><s%> this, <S%H384><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> peoples; <S%H5971><s%> Give <S%H238><s%> ear, <S%H238><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the world, <S%H2465><s%>
Both <S%H1571><s%> low <S%H1121><s%> <S%H120><s%> and high, <S%H1121><s%> <S%H376><s%> Rich <S%H6223><s%> and poor <S%H34><s%> together. <S%H3162><s%>
My mouth <S%H6310><s%> will speak <S%H1696><s%> wisdom; <S%H2451><s%> And the meditation <S%H1900><s%> of my heart <S%H3820><s%> [will be] understanding. <S%H8394><s%>
I will incline <S%H5186><s%> my ear <S%H241><s%> to a proverb; <S%H4912><s%> I will express <S%H6605><s%> my riddle <S%H2420><s%> on the harp. <S%H3658><s%>
Why <S%H4100><s%> should I fear <S%H3372><s%> in days <S%H3117><s%> of adversity, <S%H9563><s%> When the iniquity <S%H5771><s%> of my foes <S%H6120><s%> surrounds <S%H5437><s%> me,
Even those who trust <S%H982><s%> in their wealth, <S%H2428><s%> And boast <S%H1984><s%> in the abundance <S%H7230><s%> of their riches <S%H6239><s%>?

No <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> can by any <S%H6299><s%> means <S%H6299><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%> [his] brother, <S%H251><s%> Or <S%H3808><s%> give <S%H5414><s%> to God <S%H430><s%> a ransom <S%H3724><s%> for him –
For the redemption <S%H9445><s%> of his soul <S%H5315><s%> is costly, <S%H3365><s%> And he should cease <S%H2308><s%> [trying] forever <S%H5769><s%> –
That he should live <S%H2421><s%> on eternally; <S%H5331><s%> That he should not undergo <S%H7845><s%> decay. <S%H7845><s%>

For he sees <S%H7200><s%> [that even] wise <S%H2450><s%> men <S%H2450><s%> die; <S%H4191><s%> The stupid <S%H3684><s%> and the senseless <S%H1198><s%> alike <S%H3162><s%> perish, And leave <S%H6><s%> their wealth <S%H5800><s%> to others. <S%H2428><s%>

Their inner <S%H7130><s%> thought <S%H7130><s%> is, [that] their houses <S%H1004><s%> are forever, <S%H5769><s%> [And] their dwelling <S%H4908><s%> places <S%H4908><s%> to all <S%H1755><s%> generations; <S%H1755><s%> They have called <S%H7121><s%> their lands <S%H127><s%> after their own names. <S%H8034><s%>
But man <S%H120><s%> in [his] pomp <S%H3366><s%> will not endure; <S%H3885><s%> He is like <S%H4911><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that perish. <S%H1820><s%>
This <S%H2088><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> of those who are foolish, <S%H3689><s%> And of those after <S%H310><s%> them who approve <S%H7521><s%> their words. <S%H6310><s%> Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

As sheep <S%H6629><s%> they are appointed <S%H8371><s%> for Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> Death <S%H4194><s%> shall be their shepherd; <S%H7462><s%> And the upright <S%H3477><s%> shall rule <S%H7287><s%> over them in the morning; <S%H1242><s%> And their form <S%H6736><s%> shall be for Sheol <S%H7585><s%> to consume, <S%H1086><s%> So <S%H4480><s%> that they have no <S%H4480><s%> habitation. <S%H2073><s%>
But God <S%H430><s%> will redeem <S%H6299><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> from the power <S%H3027><s%> of Sheol; <S%H7585><s%> For He will receive <S%H3947><s%> me. Selah. <S%H5542><s%>

Do not be afraid <S%H3372><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> becomes <S%H6238><s%> rich, <S%H6238><s%> When <S%H3588><s%> the glory <S%H9202><s%> of his house <S%H1004><s%> is increased; <S%H7235><s%>
For when <S%H3588><s%> he dies <S%H4194><s%> he will carry <S%H3947><s%> nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> away; His glory <S%H9202><s%> will not descend <S%H3381><s%> after <S%H310><s%> him.

Though <S%H3588><s%> while he lives <S%H9132><s%> he congratulates <S%H1288><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> – And though [men] praise <S%H3034><s%> you when <S%H3588><s%> you do <S%H3190><s%> well <S%H3190><s%> for yourself –
He shall go <S%H935><s%> to the generation <S%H1755><s%> of his fathers; They shall never <S%H1><s%> <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5704><s%> see <S%H5331><s%> the light. <S%H7200><s%>
Man <S%H120><s%> in [his] pomp, <S%H3366><s%> yet without <S%H3808><s%> understanding, <S%H995><s%> Is like <S%H4911><s%> the beasts <S%H929><s%> that perish. <S%H1820><s%>
